Name: Katherine Corkrum Cabernet Franc
Wine Description: It has floral and almond notes with a rich texture and minerality. The finish is dominated by rich cherry flavors and lingering tannins.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Reserva Tinto
Wine Description: The palate has a great balance, with a tasty way, greedy for the maturity of its tannins and lively turn by good acidity it has.

Wine Description: N/A

Name: Tirant

Name: Stormwatch
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Oakville Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Deep color leads to highly fragrant aromas and fleshy dark fruits, sage, bay leaf, and a gentle touch of black pepper spice on the palate with a savory finish. Its dense, rich mouth feel, complexity and long finish.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Ruby,purple color, a classic sweet nose of blackcurrants, licorice and sweet oak. Elegant fresh raspberry, blueberry and cherry notes carry through the mid pallet. The wine finishes with long velvety sweet tannin, bitter sweet chocolate and raspberry.

Name: Pian delle Vigne Brunello di Montalcino
Wine Description: Marchesi Antinori’s passion for viticulture is expressed through perseverance: their continuous pursuit for quality improvement, even in the smallest details. Research and development is an ongoing process both in the vineyards and in the cellars: selecting new clones of local and international varieties: experimenting with new techniques in the vineyards and vineyard altitudes, new approaches to fermentation and temperature control, experimenting with both traditional and innovative winemaking philosophies, using new types of oak for barrels, barrel size and age, and varying length of aging in the bottle before commercial release.

Name: Barolo Rocche dell'Annunziata
Wine Description: N/A

Name: 1858 Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Testamatta Toscana
Wine Description: It has red is supple, with bright cherry fruit offsetting the firm tannins. Tobacco and leather flavors, with a hint of tar, add complexity as this persists through the lingering aftertaste of tobacco and spice.

Name: One Point Five Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Aromas of crushed red and black summer berries, rose petal and herbs. In the mouth the generous, lush black and red fruits integrate enticingly with sage, tobacco leaf, smoke and black spice all wrapped within a structure of ripe Stags Leap District tannins.

Name: Fusion V
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: It has Inviting aromas of toasted walnut, cedar, black cherry, blackberry, ripe fig and allspice warmth. A medium bodied wine full of flavor, elegance and balance. Bright fruit flavors of damson plum and blackcurrant are layered with notes of molasses, date, coffee, cocoa and tobacco.

Name: Chassagne-Montrachet Rouge
Wine Description: Rich aromas of red and black fruit. A fleshy, structured yet totally elegant wine.

Name: La Papesse
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Haut-Médoc
Wine Description: It has very fruity bouquet with notes of black fruits will develop the mentholated mineral character that is typical of this fine Médoc terroir.

Name: Barolo
Wine Description: Color is a moderately intense garnet red with ruby highlights. The nose is greeted with a rich presence of aromas that recall small red fruits and violets. On the palate, the wine is fresh with thick, silky tannins. The aftertaste of red fruit is long and persistent.

Name: Bricco dell'Uccellone Barbera d'Asti
Wine Description: N/A

Name: La Mémé Ceps Centenaires
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Royal St Robert Cuvée Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Fresh cut wild strawberries fill the bowl with sweet resin, white tea, thyme, forest floor and rose petals. The texture is rich, complex with silky fine-grained tannins leading to a long sumptuous finish.

Name: Bolgheri Superiore
Wine Description: Intense and luminous shades of dark ruby red colour. Very complex on the nose with fresh hints of fruit as marasca cherry, followed by intense hints of white pepper and balsamic notes, finishing with some sweetness and vanilla. After the first impact hints of citrus wood and macerated red roses are showing up.

Name: Milk & Honey
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: The nose suggests a bouquet of black cherry, cedar shavings, crème de cassis and crushed cardamom seed. Layers of tart red plum, stewed tomato paste, dried herbs and ripe raspberry envelope the palate, while subtle tannin and a bright acidity further enhance flavors of steeped black tea and dried cranberry.

Name: Auxey Duresses Premier Cru
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Coopersmith Pinot Noir
Wine Description: For those of you who must have something extraordinary on the Thanksgiving table regardless of price, this vintage of Coopersmith (one of Merry's top vineyard sources) pinot noir is a stunner. Intense and complex without being weighty, this is among the finest pinots ever to come off the Coopersmith property. It exhibits complex layers of red and black fruits, subtle earth notes and spice. The tannins are beautifully integrated. An awesome effort from California's grand dame of pinot noir.

Name: Rosso Celtico
Wine Description: Dark purple red with purple reflexes, pure, clean and of excellent juice texture, typical of ripe fruit. Fresh, enveloping, soft and firm with a fruity blackberry and Vignola cherry fragrance and hints of red rose and cyclamen.on the palate it gives off the flavour of raspberries and currants, excellent tartaric acid concentration and wonderful freshness.

Name: Charbono
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Cavolo Amarone della Valpolicella
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Oreno Toscana
Wine Description: Dark ruby red colour tinged with decisive violet tones, expresses on the nose incredible sensations o ullness and complexity with a note of ripe berries that give sensations of chocolate and nuances of balsam. Oreno is a captivating wine, rich in structure but decisively dynamic, enhanced by the nuances of new oak and an interminable nish

Name: Wight Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Balade Pinot Noir
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Santenay Premier Cru 'Clos des Mouches'
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Glasir Holt Pinot Noir
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Barolo Monfalletto
Wine Description: Intense garnet in color, the nose shows floral and spicy notes perfectly blended: tobacco, cherries, cocoa and fresh raspberry highlights. The palate is rich, full-bodied and elegant.

Name: Dickerson Zinfandel
Wine Description: Bright and fresh. An intensely perfumed bouquet displays fresh black raspberry, cedar, mint, and exotic orange that give it a Bergamot-like spice quality. The mouthfeel is big and ripe, but precise, displaying a sensation of sweetness that is nicely balanced with a tangy acidity. A long, juicy finish exhibits distinct minty mulberry flavors and a mineral driven persistence.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Pinotage
Wine Description: Full bodied structure with flavours of plum, banana, cherry and chassis, complicated by wood. Soft ripe tannins with a classic dry finish.

Name: Sassella Stella Retica
Wine Description: Colour: ruby red. Bouquet: intense, strawberry. Taste: fresh and fruity, marked and persistent.

Name: Bolgheri Superiore
Wine Description: A wine of breadth and power with wild cherry and toasty aromas, nicely balanced with dried herbs and a resonant finish. The wine's bouquet is strong with salty and a polished elegance.

Name: Amon-Ra Shiraz
Wine Description: Brilliant purple and opaque cherry hues. Spicy blackberry florals on the nose with layers of earth, dark plum and expresso. The palate displays vibrant notes of dried spice, juicy cassis and black plum.

Name: Interpretación
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Central Otago Pinot Noir
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Rosso di Montalcino
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Douro
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Saint-Émilion Grand Cru
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Pessac-Léognan
Wine Description: Medium red color. Aromas of blackcurrant, leaves, bush and earth. On the palate it has notes of fresh blackcurrant, bush and green pepper first, more dried leaves on the midpalate where tobacco and cigar box come along. Scorched earth on the finish.

Name: Prima Pietra
Wine Description: Sourced from the vineyard in the Riparbella area, Prima Pietra is structure and elegance personified, an eloquent expression of the exceptional quality of its terroir. The bouquet is full-volumed and near-endless, with fragrances of wild red berry melding into delicate notes of spice. The palate is complex, displaying impressive extractive depth and tannins that are dense, smooth, and glossy.

Name: Diamond Mountain District Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Marjorie Vineyard Pinot Noir
Wine Description: It is a very well balanced Oregon pinot; with highlights of spice, earth, and red fruit. A quality wine.

Name: La Guigasse
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Aconcagua Valley
Wine Description: Dark, dry red color. The scent has notes of berries, tobacco, cocoa, coconut and pepper. The flavor is intense, with a wealth of nuances and a very nice balance, which gives it a very classic French flavor.

Name: Canada Family Vineyard Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: It has the Pallate: Red fruit, mineral and brown spice with well integrated tannins finishing with a lingering coffee and earthy note. Lots of subtle herbal and spice notes. Food Pairings: Classic rich beef, wild mushroom sauté or soup, well-aged brine cheeses, chocolate and cream based desserts

Name: Cuvée Bargeton Chateauneuf-du-Pape
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Barolo
Wine Description: Harmonious and velvety, with limited tannin content and a consistently fine balance between alcohol and acidity. It displays extraordinary drinkability after just a few months in the bottle and, in good vintages

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Possesses intermingled notes of red plums and dark cherries, with undertones of cedar and violet. A medium plus body wine that integrates the tannins and alcohol into a lively and fresh finish.

Name: Adriane Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Intense and spicy, this has a mix of cranberry, plum and cherry fruit, with perfectly ripened tannins and overall balance. There's a bit of heat in a dark chocolate finish, and in general this young wine should continue to improve with a little more time in the bottle.

Name: Listrac-Médoc
Wine Description: A deep, dense purple color is followed by sweet aromas of creme de cassis, smoke, incense, and camphor. Rich, full-bodied, and opulent, with high levels of glycerin, fruit, and body.

Name: MunJebel Rosso
Wine Description: A classic, traditional Nerello Mascalese with tannins and sweetness of ripe fruit. My vision of a traditional,full skin contact to achieve texture and territorial identity.

Name: Anaperenna
Wine Description: Bright and vibrant dark purple colour with a nose of black currant, liquorice and anise. A finely structured tannin supports flavours of chocolate and dark berries with fresh acidity. A wine that will evolve very well with long term cellaring.

Name: Frank Phélan
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Abbott Claim Vineyard Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Savory, floral and spice focused. Lively notes of rainier cherry and passion fruit are wrapped in hazelnut, fennel seed and sandalwood. A brushed velvet texture on the palate.

Name: Il Blu
Wine Description: It has distinguished for its elegance, complexity and intensity

Name: John Sebastiano Vineyard  Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Tangy black cherry and bright acidity lively, crisp and racy with lovely style and balance. This is just one of the several excellent.

Name: Saint-Estèphe (Grand Cru Classé)
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Superieur Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Châtelet Saint-Joseph
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Cisterna Fuori
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: This wine shows aromas of current, blackberry, mocha and earth. The wine has a tight focus through a long, satisfying finish, where tannins are rich and intense.

Name: Tapestry Reserve Red Blend
Wine Description: Jeffrey, the winemaker, chose Cabernet Sauvignon and Cabernet Franc for the wine’s core of briary blackberry and cassis expression and its firm tannin structure. He then added Merlot for plush mid-palate texture and a hint of cherry. Petit Verdot and Malbec complete the blend with nuances of ripe plum, rose, forest loam and graphite.

Name: Gran Ricardo
Wine Description: The attack on the palate is smooth. It is a wine with great volume that envelops the entire palate. It is doomed, fresh acidity and warm alcohol. The tannins are sweet with a velvety body. The flavor on the palate is ripe, spicy, wood, vanilla beans and black fruits. It is a quite persistent wine that leaves a nice feeling black and balsamic fruit.

Name: Barolo Bricco Delle Viole
Wine Description: Brilliant ruby red with notes of cherries, brandied cherries, dark berries, violets and dried roses which recall nuances of citrus fruits and mint. On the palate noble and silky tannins. Very balanced with a long nish of fresh, delicate spices.

Name: Lily Hill Estate Zinfandel
Wine Description: The bouquet entices with notes of blackberry cobbler and earthy spice. On the palate, our Lily Hill zin is silky textured and juicy, gliding effortlessly to a lengthy finish where subtle vanilla and light oak notes complete this sublime zinfandel experience.

Name: Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé)
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Shiraz
Wine Description: It is a wine that has a bright red color, highlighting intense aromas of red fruits and a good balance in the mouth, soft and pleasant to the palate.
